text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Oh yeah! Your focus is TOTALLY on lives & the future of our country. I’m sure that’s why you refused to implement the DPA, told governors to find their own PPE’s & ventilators - as thousands of Americans lay dying. I believe your quote was, “I’m not a shipping clerk.” #Covid19 https://t.co/Xi0Vjp43G2
